viewtier.ui
Interface Tierlet

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConversationalTierlet, StatelessTierlet
All Known Implementing Classes:
Window
public interface Tierlet

Interface Tierlet defines external representation of view. Metods are called on Tierlet instance in the following sequence:

  • Set of setParamater calls, depending of number of parameters.
  • Execute method
  • getTierletData method
